task.summary: added some semaphores, probably not correctly
fixed some compilation errors (things needed to be initialized)
added tests for termination of services
moved the termination SYSO to MicroService after the unregistration
fixed deadlock - the resource service could get stuck while waiting for the future to be resolved, in case there is no one to free a vehicle
some changes and refractoring to fix errors caused by their tester
some small temporary changes for test
